Package me.andrew28.addons.conquer.api.events

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConquerFactionCreateEvent
    The event when a faction is created
    ConquerFactionDisbandEvent
    The event when a faction is disbanded
    ConquerFactionEvent
    An event that involves a faction
    ConquerFactionJoinEvent
    The event when a player joins a faction
    ConquerFactionLeaveEvent
    The event when a player leaves their faction
    ConquerFactionRelationEvent
    The event called when the relations change between two factions
    ConquerFactionRelationWishEvent
    The event called when a faction wishes to change relations with another faction
    ConquerLandClaimEvent
    The event called when a faction claims/declaims a piece of land
    ConquerPlayerFactionEvent
    An event that involves both a player and a faction, not necessarily the faction of that player
    ConquerPowerLossEvent
    The event called when a player loses power
    ConquerUnclaimAllEvent
    The event called when a faction declaims all of their land
